actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 49 of the United States Code to revise certain provisions relating to the transportation of food and grocery products by motor vehicle.

summary.text: Efficient Food Transportation Act of 1979 - Permits specified sellers of food and grocery products to compensate customers who pick up such products at the shipping point of the seller. Sets forth the conditions under which such compensation may be made available.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 49 of the United States Code to revise certain provisions relating to the transportation of food and grocery products by motor vehicle.
